General.Name: Phoenix New Media Limited
General.Description: Phoenix New Media Limited provides content on an integrated Internet platform in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Net Advertising Services and Paid Services. The company, through its website, ifeng.com, provides various interest-based content verticals, such as news, military affairs, video, technology, finance, entertainment, automobiles, sports, real estate, home living, fashion, and history; and interactive services, including comment postings and user surveys. It also provides mobile newspaper and mobile video services, as well as e-commerce and wireless value-added services. In addition, its mobile channel consists of ifeng News, a news application that provides newsfeeds and other content in the form of text, images, live streaming, and video; ifeng Video, a video application, which offers video news, live broadcasting, Phoenix TV programs content, etc.; i.ifeng.com mobile Internet website; and digital reading applications. The company offers content and services through PC, mobile, and third-party channels, as well as transmits content primarily through Phoenix TV to TV viewers. Phoenix New Media Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Phoenix New Media Limited is a subsidiary of Phoenix Satellite Television (B.V.I.) Holding Limited.
